long_description: Stay active and organized with the Sherpani Milli satchel. It carries your daily gear in its generous main pocket and handily organizes smaller items, all in a high-quality design and striking style. Deep zippered main compartment is sized to accommodate an e-reader; front-flap magnetic closure. Two external zippered pockets; one external mesh pocket. Key clip; detachable change purse; pen holders. Adjustable shoulder strap. Cotton/nylon blend.
short_description: Stay active and organized with the Sherpani Milli satchel. It carries your daily gear in its generous main pocket and handily organizes smaller items, all in a high-quality design and striking style.
